mapper.select: select log.*, department.dept_name from log join department on log.dept_code = department.dept_code order by log_seq desc

SELECT log.*, department.dept_name FROM log join department on log.dept_code = department.dept_code
AND log.emp_name like '%' || #{empName} || '%'
AND log.emp_id like '%' || #{empId}|| '%'
AND log.log_status = #{logStatus}
AND log.local_logtime >= TO_DATE(#{specificStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00'
AND log.local_logtime <= TO_DATE(#{specificEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59:59'
order by log.log_seq desc
